name: Sherry LEGARE-UNDERWOOD
text: Had the best time at a big party enjoying wine, snacks and good company, with old and new friends. The staff at Wine & Design catered to out every need and we all ended up with a beautiful piece of original art that I still have on my mantle. Great place to take visitors coming from out of town too.

name: Lazy Byne
text: I really enjoyed my experience at Wine and Design. The atmosphere was very calm, relaxed, fun and refreshing. I had fun and my guess enjoyed it as well. We will be returning for another event of fun. The instructor was awesome and her assistant as well. They made it enjoyable. Thank you for a great life experience/memory with you and my family.

name: T-Bird Mableton
text:
My family had a fabulous virtual experience with Monica and Imani of Wine & Design! The planning and preparation for our "Birthday Partini" was a smooth process, and all the materials arrived on time. Overall it was a creative, unique and successful party. We had a blast!

Have a Paint 'n Sip party with Wine & Design. You won't regret it.

name: Susan Hargrave
text: My friend and I had a great time! We loved the pumpkin portraits that we did. The instructor was good and very helpful.

name: Leslie Cox
text: Had a wonderful time with my friend “arting” our hearts out. Great little shop and the owner and teacher were fabulous and accommodating. Would go back again over and over!

name: Maleika McMillan
text: Our virtual party was professional, fun, and really necessary. My co-workers and I had a chance to safely socialize and laugh outside of our typical office environment. It was definitely a team building experience.  Our instructor was Monica and she was amazing! She laughed and joked with us.  This helped to put a lot of us that were unsure about painting at ease. I would definitely recommend it to anyone that will listen. Thank you for the fun experience! I even have a lovely painting to show off.

resp.text: We really appreciate that feedback.

name: Kelley Eley
text: Fantastic experience! The instructor was great and helped guide us through creating a masterpiece :) The studio is beautiful and very inviting AND the wine is great too!

name: Jesscynthia Collins
text: I went for my birthday and had a fabulous time! It was a great experience with my daughter and friends! I will be back!

name: Jenny Renea C. Pruitt
text: I really enjoy coming here to pretend I'm an artist for a few hours.  I've been able to paint pictures I have been really surprised I actually created.  The store is clean and the staff is very friendly and helpful.  Savanna Pruitt has taught the classes I've taken and I highly recommend requesting one of her classes, but everyone is really nice and friendly.

name: Lenora Patterson
text: Although painting is not something I usually enjoy, I have attended classes at W&D twice and had a great time. The instructors are knowledgeable and everyone stresses having a good time more than worrying how your painting will turn out. I was able to relax and just enjoy time with my friends. I’ve also participated in a virtual party. My kit was delivered on time with everything I needed to have a safe painting experience with my family. I will definitely be supporting again in the future!

resp.text: We really appreciate those kind words! Thanks!

name: b p
text: My friends and I enjoyed our first time experience of doing anything like this. We were able to create great art. The environment was just that warm and inviting that we met new people and had great conversation.

name: Nicole Beasley
text: Fun atmosphere! I've gone twice and both times I had a wonderful experience.

name: Josh Fuqua
text:
The instructor was great. The atmosphere was great. The night was great.

I had almost no idea what I was doing and ended up with a painted decoration that I will actually display during Christmas. Thank you, Wine & Design.

name: Onica Sanders
text: This is a wonderful place to throw a party!! You are able to choose your painting, play your own music, and bring food. I thoroughly enjoyed myself and loved the professionalism of the owners.

name: Kamisha Coleman
text: Thank you for making my daughter's virtual birthday party a great experience! We loved painting the pineapple picture. The owner also took the time to play music that went along with our theme for the kids while they painted. The kits were beautifully and professionally done & easy to deliver to all the guests. In the mist of a pandemic we were still able to enjoy ourselves virtually! Thank you again! K.C.

resp.text: Thank you for being our customer! We're glad you were pleased with Virtual Paint Party.

name: Lauren Robbins
text: Wonderful time! Small group with lots of One on one attention,which I needed! Want to do theChinky blanket class again soon! It I spurred me to learn to crochet! 😊

text: Awesome-awesome experience! Great place for girls night and tons of fun!

text: I paid for 2 tickets. I was told that I could use the credits for another paint date instead(due to me not being able to make the original date). Contacted customer service and never got a response.$ 80.00 gone to waste. Never again

resp.text: Kelsie, did you email us at montgomery.al@wineanddesign.com? We have no record of correspondence with you. We will not have an issue with giving you a credit.

name: Hope Allen
text: I had such a fun time here! It was great!

name: Asia
text: Great date night idea

name: Thalita Rabb
text: My coworkers and myself we attended this venue on Saturday, February 6 for my coworkers birthday🎂. The instructor was great no problems very professional, awesome we had a great time. Towards the end someone comes 😳in the back door so we’re all looking like 🤔who is this coming in here. We 🤷🏽‍♀️guessed it was the owner she doesn’t introduce herself & suddenly the whole vibe turns negative in the room 👎🏾.Then @ 8:58 she hollers out loud you have 2 minutes left & you can 💵buy some more time🥴. So everyone is looking like she’s kicking 🏃🏽‍♀️us our at this point we’re rushing gathering everything😫. She hollers 🗣leave the artist a $20 tip it’s in your contract. Ok kool not a problem but her tone was loud & extremely rude 😤she was very unprofessional. I will not return nor recommend this venue to anyone. Hopefully 😫 the owner will be more professional at future events. Have a beautiful day 🤩🥳🤪.

resp.text: I apologize if my tone seem rude. It was definitely not my intention or my reputation. Thank you giving us a try and your honest feedback. We are happy you enjoyed your class.

name: Theresa Fortson
text: My co workers and I came to wine & design on 2/5/21 for a sip & paint to celebrate Tomeka's birthday. The artist was absolutely wonderful, helpful, patient and made us feel comfortable I believe her name was Charletta. But towards the end another lady comes in through the back and I am assuming she is the owner but she didn't introduce herself so at 8:58 she hollers out that we have 2 minutes left unless we want to buy more time now mind you the painting was not finished we still had to do the lips and sign it but we rushed through to get it done so we never got to take pictures with our painting at this point we are trying to help Tomeka pack up her food and she also did not get to open her gifts because we were rushed out and she had to rush and cut her cake plus it was raining and cold last night and to put the icing on the cake the owner says as we are leaving that in your contract you have to tip the artist a minimum of $20 so Tomeka gives the artist the $20 tip which she did deserve I said all of that to say this its not what you say it's how you say it and after that experience I will not be returning to this establishment and I wanted to see how this night went so I could plan to have a couples sip and paint night for my anniversary but due to how we were treated in the end I will be looking for another location/establishment

resp.text: Please accept our sincere apology. It wasn’t my attention to appear to be rude. Announcing the time left in and asking the party if they want to purchase more time is customary and something we do at every private party . I did politely announce that you can continue to paint as we clean up. I did see several people taking pictures at the end as we were cleaning up. We hope guys will give us another try.  :)

name: cynthia ferguson
text: I enjoyed my first visit the host Monica was very knowledgeable about painting and made you feel at home i will be going back

resp.text: Thank you for the opportunity.

name: Theressa Virgil
text:
Fun, professional, and memorable! During the pandemic, we were looking for a way to safely have a birthday party celebration. Monica and Imani were the answer to our prayers.

They provided the perfect virtual experience so that attendees from all over the country could participate. There was prompt communication, the materials arrived on time, and we enjoyed a delightful “painting partini” on Zoom. Don’t let distance dampen your fun. Let Monica and Imani show you how it’s done!

name: Ansley Turner
text: Had a great time! Made us feel comfortable and welcome. Enjoyed painting and relaxing with my family. Very nice setup Monica and Imani were very kind and attentive definitely will be back. Definitely recommend!

name: Amber Smith
text: Awesome experience with friends! Honestly, you can't go wrong with painting and margaritas! Look forward to returning.

name: Jewel Whiting
text: Cost too much for just a paint session and the eine is extra.. disappointed

resp.text: Hi Jewel,  thank you for taking the time to leave us a review! I’m so sorry you felt the experience wasn’t a 5-star one. Our pricing is in line with the paint and sip industry standard, and we pride ourselves on our beautiful painting selections and excellent artist instruction. We list all our policies and instructions- including that we are not a BYOB studio- in our class descriptions when you check out because we understand the importance of setting expectations! We will look into how we can make it clearer that beverages are available for purchase. Again, I’m so sorry you were dissatisfied. As a local small business I am grateful for everyone who walks in the door,  and I appreciate your feedback.

name: Adria D
text: Had so much fun! Very pretty and clean environment.

name: Cassie Rockette
text: Great place, the staff is very friendly, hands-on and adjustable.  They have great customer service, very clean and inviting place.

name: Mike Hand
text: Fun friendly and very clean. Loved it.

name: Lisa Brown
text: Great place to enjoy the company of friends and create your own masterpiece.

name: SJ SJ
text: Attended an event nice place but the owner rushed the guest and kept referring to time left before event end. A bit tacky considering guest had an invitation with time.

resp.text: We are so sorry you felt rushed! We always kindly remind our guest how much time is left so that we may finish on time to prepare and start our next class on time. We hope that you will give us another chance in the future and we appreciate your feedback.

name: Stacey Owens
text: Devan did an amazing job on our outdated kitchen! The cabinets and island were dark stained and very 80’s-90’s look. The original hinges were exposed and she put in all new hidden hinges as well as painted all cabinetry a beautiful off white satin. She kept me informed every day on her progress until she was completely finished. I would definitely recommend her work to anyone looking for a freshly updated kitchen or room!

resp.text: Thank you ❤

name: Jennifer Yobs
text: Elek Designs is amazing. Devan does an outstanding job and is very friendly/easy to work with. I was blown away by her process. She really takes care of your home. She also made some suggestions about hardware placement for us that I hadn’t considered and I really appreciated her taking the extra time to make it all perfect. We had 2 bathrooms, our laundry room, and kitchen done by her. I highly recommend her!

resp.text: Thank you ❤

name: Dana Brown
text: I would not go to anyone else EXCEPT Elek Designs! Devan and her work are wonderful! This is the 3rd cabinet set that I've had her redo over the last year and every single time I have been 110% happy with her work. 2 of the 3 sets she installed new hardware on which is a huge stress relief. (3rd being my fault because I hadn't picked out what I wanted yet). She answers any questions you may have, she listens, and will be happy to provide her professional input if asked.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Monica Scott
text: Devan did an exceptional job in helping to make my dream kitchen a reality. Her setup is completely professional and she protected every surrounding surface.  She kept me informed of the status of the project and ensured the final decorative finish was to my satisfaction before proceeding.  She was enjoyable to work with and did an exceptional job! You can trust Devan to make your space amazing!!

resp.text: Thank you (:

resp.text: Thank you for the opportunity

resp.text: Thank you for the opportunity!

name: dawnm61767
text:
Had a horrible experience at this store just a few minutes ago.  My home is a little complex with the layout. So choosing colors was a bit difficult.I took pictures of the home so they would be able to see what I was wanting to do. First the guy told me how to paint it and where to end it. Then he changed his mind. Then I was more confused. So instead of helping me he gave me a business card and said to talk to some other people at Sherwin Williams. Even though he stated they were all professionals there. Then told me the people I should talk to are also professionals.  All he did was pawn us off to someone else. text: My daughter paid $45.00 each for both of our projects 2/3 weeks prior to the class. When we arrived, we were told they did not have anyone signed up for that class. My daughter showed her email for payment conformation. The instructor said she would have to cut our pieces. It seemed a bother. We stood around for a while & she finally told us to sit with another class. I feel like we were not shown the attention as everyone else. We had to ask for paint, brushes, & water to clean the brushes. We are pretty crafty so we just looked at the sample and completed it on our own. We did not get holes drilled for the hanger...she could not work the drill and the piece was not sealed. I do not recommend this business. Everyone should be treated with the same attention.....very disappointed!!

name: Nameless Faceless
text:
My mom, niece, and I had a pretty abysmal experience here.
It was our third time doing a sip and paint class (I don't even want to call it a class at this point). There was little to no direction by the "instructor" who made it VERY clear that she was not supposed to be there that late and informed us that the girl who was supposed to teach the class couldn't make it.
Like many other establishments like this, they offer a variety of painting classes at different levels of difficulty. You also have the option to "upgrade" your painting by purchasing a larger canvas.
Another thing that most of these places do is sell the paintings that the instructors do during every class. I wish I could say that they're affordable and worth the price, but that definitely is not the case. When I inquired about which paintings were for sale and about the general cost, the woman got snarky with me. After paying well over $100 to for little to no instruction and having an overall bland experience, I did not want to give this place any more of my money.
PAINTER'S TIP:
I would suggest stopping by Walmart (or ordering off Amazon) and getting a cheap variety pack of paintbrushes (I posted a photo of the pack I purchased). I found that the brushes they supplied were a little worn out and often I couldn't get my lines as thin as I wanted them (I have a heavy hand).

We were able to install a very high quality architectural shingle and stay within budget thanks to Jeremy and 1 Stop Roofing & Exterior.

Lastly, I would recommend Jeremy and 1 Stop Roofing & Exteriors services to everyone.  Thank you for all that you did to make the process run smoothly!

text:
1 Stop literally saved our new 4 seasons room. The guys assembling the room noted a leak in the J channels from the other gutter system. I called 1 Stop and they responded ASAP.
They inspected all aspects of the situation and made note of the extent of the damage. Their estimate was reasonable, Josh was professional and personable, and the explanations were clear and concise.
The work was completed in a timely manner, the new gutters are performing flawlessly, and they matched the new shingles to our existing roof.
Pleased? Very.
Would I recommend them? I already have.
Would I use them again. 1 Stop is saved to our contacts. Skip and I are not about to lose their info.
Thanks guys, we appreciate all your help.
The Johnstons

resp.text: Thanks for the business! It was a pleasure working with you!

text: If there was a higher star, I would rate it! These guys did an incredible job from start to finish! They were not pushy, they worked with me and helped me understand the entire process, and they do a phenomenal job doing the actual work. I’m not going to name names but one of the more popular roofing companies around town that was also in my neighborhood, actually stop by my job midway through, and tried to recruit 1Stop’s workers. Luckily the superintendent was there to thwart that effort, LOL! All of the workers were extremely courteous of my property and did a super job picking up afterwards. This was not a rush job and I did not feel like they were trying to just move on to the next job to make a quick buck. In fact, before I even shared any of my insurance claim report with the owner Jeremy, I had him come out and do a complete blind estimate. This was my way of at least trying to determine if they were taking advantage of me. They were extremely thorough and came in at a very fair price. I had no problem giving them this work, and I will call them, and only them,  for any roofing need in the future. Highly, highly recommend you give them a call!

text: I recently had Revive Pro Painting do some interior painting at my home. I cannot say enough good things about the company. The project was completed on time and at a really reasonable price. text: From the beginning, Jordan and Derrick arrived on time, were very knowledgeable about what needed to be done and had my estimate ready when they said. This puts them far above the other companies I had called to bid on the job. Then, the work and crew was excellent and Derrick checked in daily to supervise. They even corrected mistakes made by previous painters that I hadn’t noticed. Highly recommend Revive Pro Painting and will definitely use them again!

text: Hired this company for painting and popcorn ceiling removal. Very professional estimating process and good communication with the owner. The quality of finishing work of their subcontractors wasn't initially up to par, but the owner responded positively and worked diligently to ensure the quality of finish met his expectations and ours.

name: Michael Jones
text: There is good and there is great. Revive pro was great. Finished an interior paint job and was there when they said they would, did what they said they would and meticulously took care of our house. Luis and his crew were some of the nicest and responsive people I’ve ever worked with. They truly were there to do the job perfectly. Their pricing was competitive. We now have “our painters” . Five star on every count.

name: Michael Staley
text: We hired this company to paint our home exterior.  We were very specific about wanting our windows caulked good and about wanting our fascia board and soffits to be caulked and smooth at the end.  Jordan went above and beyond to meet our goals and his team takes great pride in their work. We recommend this company and welcome anyone to reach out to schedule a chat if you have any doubts or questions.

name: Mary Ann Bridges
text:
This is the THIRD time I’ve used Revive Pro! I find them so incredibly reliable! Having Brian come to the house and provide an appropriate quote and he continues to be the point person for the project. He offers great advise on common paint colors used around town. And also the quality of paint required for the job.
I highly recommend Revive! Each painter we’ve used for different projects all have extreme attention to detail!

name: Pam S
text: Revive Pro did an excellent job painting the interior of my home. They responded in a timely manner and were professional and courteous. I highly recommend this company.

name: jack tucker
text: Revive Pro was extremely professional with attention to detail in their work.  They were on time and on estimate during our exterior painting project.  Their customer service and follow through to insure our satisfaction was a pleasure to see.  Very few companies reach back to ensure their work was up to your expectations.  Revive Pro and their representatives did just that.  We are now using them on our deck cleaning and waterproofing.  We highly recommend Revive Pro.  A local business that will serve our community for years to come.

name: Gary Gerson
text: We used Revive to paint the interior of our home.  Levi, our project manager, was always on-time, very professional, patient, and easy to talk to and work with throughout the project.  Revive provided a very detailed proposal with pricing for each aspect of the project, as well as pictures of each room.  Levi’s team always showed up on-time, did an excellent job, and finished on time.  We could not be happier with the quality of the finished product, and I would not hesitate to recommend Revive in the future!!

name: Ernie Jonseof
text: I have had my clients call Jordan and have used Revive Pro personally. The quality of the process is amazing. Have had only positive feedback from many of those clients.  I highly recommend Revive Pro for all your painting needs.

resp.text: Thank you Ernie for trusting us with your clients and thank you for the kind words.

name: Jeff Holland
text: The Revive Pro team handled our entire exterior painting including porches and patios. Best painting service we’ve ever used. Jordan, Brian and their whole team are great communicators, professionals and know their business. They strive for perfection and it shows! We could not be more pleased with their work and the whole experience!

name: lisa bengtson
text: They were awesome from start to finish.  They removed the popcorn from my ceiling (it is valued) and painted it...It looks perfect! Then they put a lime wash on my brick fireplace and it is amazing. They wouldn’t stop until I was satisfied. After all that that they mopped the ceiling dust from my wood floors and put all the furniture back in place. Oh, and their pricing is very fair. I’ll use them again for sure!

name: Kim Maze
text: Outstanding company!  Revive-Pro just painted the exterior of our home and did an excellent job! From start to finish it was a positive experience!  Thanks Jordan Means and Brian Tannler for your professionalism and excellent crew.  We appreciate the time Jordan spent in giving us his recommendations and detailed quote.  And, we also appreciate Brian for staying fully engaged with his crew and for staying in touch with us as they painted.  Side note: Prior to choosing Revive-Pro we reached out to 3 other big-name painting companies to compare quotes and Jordan was by far the most professional we spoke to and seemed to genuinely care that we’d be fully pleased at the end of their services.  I highly recommend Revive-Pro!

name: Jenna Brady
text: Take it from a repeat customer and hire Revive Pro. I promise you won’t be disappointed. In addition to painting, Revive Pro also offers framing, drywall, and trim services. I previously had them paint my entire interior and they did an outstanding job. When we decided to finish our basement, we made the mistake of hiring another company to do our framing and much of it was not done properly. Thankfully, I called Jordan and he and his team were able to fix the framing issues immediately. I also hired them to do drywall, paint, trim, and doors, and within one week, our 1,600 sq ft basement was finished! I could not be happier! Jordan, Brian, and their team always showed up on time, were professional, and had impeccable attention to detail that put me completely at ease. If you want the job done right the first time, do yourself a favor and call Revive Pro.

name: Marguerite Fondren
text: Revive Pro did an outstanding job painting our kitchen cabinets. The price was fair and the painters were on time, respectful of our property, friendly and finished in a timely manner.   They are very professional and our cabinets are beautiful!

text: They made the process very easy and were great to work with. The crew was exceptional! Thank you for a beautiful update to the exterior of our home!

text: Levi and Jordan were able to respond to a damaged ceiling so quickly! My house was protected with SO many drop cloths that I feel the floors were cleaner for their being at the house! I can only recommend Revive Pro for any painting needs, either indoor or outside.  Thank you guys.

name: Julie Preskitt
text: I can’t say enough great things about Revive Pro. Jordan, Brian, and Levi are fantastic and the crew did excellent work. They were here when they said would be and finished early. They were professional and not one drop of paint was anywhere it shouldn’t have been. And so clean and respectful that people live here. Every day they left my yard as if they had never been there, even though it probably would have been easier to just leave their things out for the next day. Great quality work at a fantastic price. Highly recommend!

text: 360 Painting is professional from beginning to end! Daniel Moore was our contact person and was superb. The crew he sent to do the painting was fantastic! Professional, considerate, and hard-working! Great experience for us, as homeowners.  Highly recommend this company!

text: Daniel did an excellent job addressing all my questions.  And his quote was very competitive. This was an exterior paint job and I will definitely use again when it is time for the interior !

text: Price was competitive compared to the other quotes I received and Brent (the owner) was initially very responsive. Both his exterior (Paco) and interior (Heath) painters are good. They exterior was completed by a team or 4 in a one day and the interior was completed by a single painter in 4 days (large room, kitchen, and hallway).

text: 360 painting Is a great company to work for with great professional painters and they take care of all its employees.

name: George Simpson
text:
Our experience with 360 Painting restored our belief that there are companies today who strive to do their very best work at the very best price. Immediately after I contacted owner ,Brent Edwards , about our paint needs on our home in English Village he came to give us an estimate for this work. Within a week he and his lead painter arrived for the job to begin.   The work was professional in every way. Once begun the work continued unless I had a reason that it needed to stop for a couple of days.  I was kept updated throughout the project.  Working with 360 Painting was a Pleasure.
Beth Simpson

resp.text: George and Beth.  5 star clients and friends.  Heath says hello

name: Angela Hancock
text:
Taking on a major home improvement project always feels like gambling to me. Will I pick the right product, style, company to do the work. So many decisions! It's tough. Well, I won the jackpot! 360 painting was a definite win for me. Brent Edwards, the owner, was professional, friendly, and gave a great price. He even went beyond and re screened my sitting area in the process. The person he sent was Heath. Heath was kind, professional and is a very knowledgeable painter. His work ethic was exceptional, considering it was 95 to 100 degrees every day. He managed to work thru that heat and didn't even take a lunch break!
My house looks great and I would recommend this company without exception.

resp.text: Hi Angela, it was such a pleasure for us here at 360° Painting Vestavia Hills to work with you. We hope to see you in the future!

name: Tracy Simmons
text: I would highly recommend this painting company.  They were professional, efficient, and determined to provide top quality work.   Job well done!!!

resp.text: Thanks Tracy!  We truly appreciate the kind words and it's been so nice getting to know you all during the process.

name: Matt Reeves
text: Brent and his team at 360 Painting did an amazing job. My project was very complex and I must say I was very impressed. I really like the professionalism and attention to detail. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thanks Matt. It was our pleasure!!!

name: shaheen upton
text: Brent is extremely difficult to work with. He kept giving us the runaround and after several weeks of constantly pushing the job back for various reasons, we finally had to let him know we were going to find another painter. Unfortunately, we had already paid him for half the job even though he had completed less than a fourth. it was obvious that he had never really worked on a large job. I would not recommend using him!

resp.text: I must say I strongly disagree.  Neither owners were ever onsite except Mrs. Shaheen once to meet me us there.  Mr. Shaheen (project manager of the job) never once met me at the property and we were told to facetime them if myself or the painters needed anything.  We were contracted to paint the walls and ceilings only after drywall contractors finished.  The drywall was poorly done and we would have had to go back and finish up that contractors job.  Our painters are extremely skilled and neither of them would paint as it wasn't ready to paint.   I was onsite and sent pictures and texts explaining it wasn't ready but owners at one point has multiple contractors in the office at the same time.   We decided to part ways.   I wish everyone all  the best.

name: Dan Miedema
text: Brent is very professional. He communicates well, he shows up on time, and his painters do a great job. I would recommend using 360 painting for all of your painting needs!

resp.text: Thanks Dan for the kind words

name: Anthony Williams
text: They were scheduled to come out to my house 9:30 Thruday Nov.7th a.m for popcorn ceiling. Instead they called me and asked me if I can send them a pic of my issue and they would make their assessment that way. When I asked what happened to someone coming out and giving me an estimate, the guy representing the company(Brent Edwards) said they had a project to do at the same time the company were suppose to come to my house, taking the pic and sending it to them(by phone) will give them a visual of what needed to be done and they will quote a price from there. So I send them the pics after about a hour or so, my wife told me "maybe you should call them. I called them and the guy representing  the company(Brent Edwards)told me he will give me an estimate after his lunch. I'm like really !!! I told my wife he wasn't going to call us back and he didn't. Now this wasn't professional from the beginning. How are you not going to inform us about another project that you took on or u forgot about. Let alone you never acknowledged this over the phone. When I did bring it up you wanted me to send a pic so u can call me with an estimate which u never did. Poor Customer Service and a lack of trust from this company.

resp.text: Anthony please be honest as I spoke with your wife for 15 minutes over the phone as I was in route.  I've never met or talked to you before.   Weather was awful and I asked since it was two popcorn ceilings and I was 45 miles away we felt that was just fine to send two pictures for an estimate. Please communicate realistic facts sir given the weather situation at the time.   Thank you

They painted the outside of our house and replaced rotten siding.

name: JIMMY DEAN
text: If you have needs from gutters, roofing, flooring etc you definitely need to contact Mark with "All Around the House." He will come and give you an estimate which can't be beat for the quality of work they provide. They work with your schedule, work in a timely manner, strive for perfection and stay in contact to make sure you are pleased. I will definitely be using them again for future work.

name: Katherin Watkins
text:
Mark was very precise and knowledgeable of our roofing and gutter issues. The guys done a magnificent job, where polite and professional!
I will definitely use your services again.

name: Danielle Fife
text:
All around the house did a outstanding job on our gutters and downspouts they look flawless!
Mark arrived to give the estimate and it was dry that day but he was on point as he explained where we would an could have water troubles with draining issues by the layout of the landscape an he was on point as we’ve seen the same issues on rainy days.
The crew he sent was a pleasure to work with, hardly even knew they was outside.

name: Jacob (Jake) Wilson
text: Quality service! We needed gutters on the back side of our house and reviews were good for All Around The House, so we decided to contact for an estimate. Mark came out while we were away and gave us an accurate estimate for lower than we were thinking, so we booked a time for him to come out and install. We only needed a small amount of gutters, but Mark and his team came out and completed the job within a couple of hours with no problem. We will definitely be using them again for any more house projects!

name: Pam Jones
text: I cannot say enough good things about All Around The House. I was in need of someone to assemble two pieces of furniture and did an internet search to find someone in my area. I found All About The House, left a voice mail, and within minutes Stephen returned my call. Luck was on my side as he had some time that same day to help me out. He and Kayla arrived on time, and they quickly got to work assembling the furniture. They worked fast but did a very thorough job, even disposing of the boxes and trash after completion. They were friendly, capable, and the price was very fair and reasonable. You never know what you are going to get when you blindly reach out to someone, and I could not be more pleased with my experience with All Around The House. I highly recommend them for your home needs!

name: Brian Boackle
text: When it came time to get my house painted, I did my research and found Altract to be highly rated so I gave them a shot.  What a COMPLETE DISAPPOINTMENT!  Bryant Darby came for the initial consultation and was very thorough and detail oriented, so I could only assume the painters would follow suit. Long story short, the painters were absolutely terrible! The crew dripped paint EVERYWHERE.  Inside and outside of my house were covered in drips of white paint.  **UPDATE:  The paint drips were on a brand new deck (less than 2 years old); a new rug (less than 2 years old) and newly installed flowerbeds/rocks less than a month before the paint job.  THIS WAS NOT FROM A PREVIOUS PAINT JOB!!!!   Every time they returned to fix something, they'd leave their mark on something else.  It finally got to the point that I didn't even want them on my property any longer.  The lame attempt they made to clean up after themselves was laughable and I was ready to cut my losses** The house wasn't prepped correctly and I have fresh paint peeling already!   They broke bulbs on my string lights and not only didn't tell me, but didn't bother to clean it up!   This crew was completely lazy and careless.  I'm glad others had a pleasurable experiences with Altract, but I would award zero stars if google would allow.

resp.text: Brian, I'm sorry you were unhappy with your painting experience.  The painters did come back to the house to clean off any drips and as we discussed with you onsite many of the drips were from the previous times the house was painted and could not be cleaned.  To my knowledge any drips or spills we were responsible for were cleaned from the house.  If you do have peeling paint from the current job we did for you please remember you have a 3 year warranty that covers any peeling, flaking, or fading. Likely this is not a product of incorrect prep but the conditions in which the paint was applied.  If any moisture gets trapped between the paint and the wood it will peel no matter how well the house was prepped.  This is why we offer the warranty we do.  Please feel free to contact us to schedule any necessary warranty work.  We are happy to fix anything we are responsible for.

name: Claire Green
text: Terrible communication. What should have been a straightforward,  2.5 day job turned into a 5 week nightmare. I give 4 stars for the completed work (some pieces were still not replaced as discussed). However, I give the "supervisor" 0 stars for communication. No call/no show multiple days, even numerous days when weather was not a factor and they could have completed work. Voicemail box was so full I couldn't leave a message. After our color boards were dropped off, we NEVER saw Donnie again. Not once did he come to the jobsite after saying multiple times that he would, even though his crew (and their equipment) was at my house off and on for a month. What a shame because they came recommended by 2 family friends. Very disappointing...

I have spoken to all of our estimators and project managers and no one has your name listed in our records or has knowledge of your name. Are you sure Altract Co painted your house? There is a company in Birmingham by the name of Atract Painting, who is not us. If something like this has occurred, we will always take care of it no problem. resp.text: We appreciate your review and apologize for this situation. We would like to better understand the product issue you're experiencing. name: Michael Gosnell
text: I generally never go here because of the prices.  It had been a long time since I used their paint but I had a client who wanted it.  Staff was friendly and store was cleaned and we'll stocked.  However, it cost $630 for 10 gallons of paint!  Holy cow!  Same amount of paint at Home Depot for Behr Premium would have been $232.  Paint was fine but I actually prefer the quality of the cheaper paint.  They did carry the paint out to my truck with a dolly but I could have hired two people for the day to help me ALL day for the price difference.

resp.text:
Hi Michael, Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We're sorry you feel our pricing is not in line with the industry. As a corporation, Sherwin-Williams has made great strides to control costs on everything from raw materials to office supplies in order to stay priced competitively. We have increased prices only as a last resort and in most cases, after our competitors have already done so. We do offer many sales and promotions throughout the year. In addition, if you sign up for our PaintPerks program you will receive a $10 off of $50 coupon, everyday discounts on paints, stains and supplies and exclusive sales and emails. For more information on this program, please visit www.mysw.com. We thank you for sharing this feedback with us. If you have any additional questions, please give us a call at 1-800-4Sherwin (474-3794) or email us at https://www.sherwin-williams.com/homeowners/contact-us/feedback.
Thank you. Sincerely, T.H., SW Customer Service Rep.

name: Laura Turner
text: I went with the Painting Company because they were the lowest bid. What a mistake. It took them two months to come paint the house and then a week to complete the job. The first day, a foreman came by, but just have me sign some papers. He immediately left and just one painter remained. There was a woman (who was never introduced to me) who came for part of the days, but she wasn't always there. There was no oversight of the painter. He was very polite, but sloppy and didn't want to do all the work that was quoted. There were paint drips everywhere, missed spots, and worst of all, splatters on on my tile floors that do not want to come up. I would not use the Painting Company again.

resp.text: We regret you had a negative experience with our company. We have several painting crews and work diligently to complete our customers projects as soon as possible. During the spring and summer months our schedule does fill up quickly and we do book out a month or two. Some of our larger crews will spilt into 2 person crews in order to reduce the wait for upcoming projects. That is what occurred with your project. The foreman had split his team and was covering two projects at the same time. These jobs are also visited multiple times by our production manager. This particular job was visited several times by the production manager who was not made aware of the complaints. Our foreman also did a walkthrough with the homeowner at the end of a project at which time any problem areas are addressed and the project is signed off by the customer. Unfortunately, we were unaware of problems with your project until this post. Once we were made aware, we contacted you to rectify the problem areas but the home had been sold.

name: Jimmy Lauderdale
text:
Read this review..............
We needed the inside of our home painted,  The entire inside, all the walls and ceilings in every room.  After 20+ years and doing touch up painting as needed, we had to do more and that involved changing colors in about 70% of the house.

We did our due diligence and got three estimates from reputable painters.  The first came in roughly $4000 over our budget and we began to consider just painting the main level.  The second (who we had used in the past) was only $200 over budget, had done good work for us in the past and we were now in a comfortable price range.  The Painting Company was the last we called and came highly recommended by several friends and neighbors.

When Peter and I completed our walk through, he handed me a nice glossy folder containing references, insurance information, standard practices and the like.  We had also discussed upgrading from a contractor grade paint to something better (especially since we are known to only paint when its an absolute necessity).  Peter was courteous and professional and as he drove off, I knew we could never afford what we had discussed.

The bid from the Painting Co came in the next day and was $1600 under budget ($1800 under the next closest bid and $5600 under the high bid).  I read through the detailed list of inclusions and exclusions, the color choices in the different rooms, the type and manufacturer of paint to be used and found it all to be exactly as discussed the day earlier.  We had found ourselves a painter.

We called and set up a date to start, game them a 25% deposit to cover material and began taking down pictures and putting away breakables.

A little over a week later, two painters showed up at the house as scheduled.  They may have been 10 or 15 minutes late.  But, that was all.  The date was correct and they had all their gear and were ready to go.  We walked through the house marking which rooms were to be painted which colors to avoid any confusion or misunderstanding and they began moving furniture, taping the trim and covering everything (and I mean everything.  our house looked like a drop cloth bomb had exploded in it).

That day and part of the next were ceiling days and they began some of the upstairs walls.  The next day the upstairs was complete and they brought the show to the main level.  Three and a half days after beginning, they were cleaning up the house, we did a final walk through, some light touch up and they replaced the furniture before leaving.

They had estimated four to five days and finished in three and a half and the product was nothing short of excellent.  I was contacted promptly when they had the one question that required a minimal amount of homeowner guidance.

It's been a week now and every time we walk into a room we are still amazed by the quality of work and the difference that it makes.  I guess it's time to start planning the painting of the outside again.  The Painting Company will get the job.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the incredibly detailed 5-Star Review, Jimmy!

name: Sandra Short
text: They painted my house onside and out. At first I was happy with it for a week or so and then I started finding unpainted places, peeling paint ..they came back out and painted the unpainted places and repainted where the paint was peeling off bit it was raining the day they came out and now the paint has run and bubbled up.  Now I fiND I can't raise my windows upstairs because they painted them shut.  I will not use them again

text: They did a good job and they did it fast.  No surprises.  Very fair price.  We had 3 estimates and they had a slightly lower price than the others with the same type of process and paint. I spotted a couple minor issues upon my initial review before signing off and they took care of it.  Since then I've spotted a couple more very minor issues that I can handle.  I just think if they had a manager or designated professional inspect the job upon completion they would see things I missed.  That being said, they did a very good job, very quickly at a good price and I would use them again.

text: William did a GREAT job. Lots of attention to detail, very neat. Completed the job ahead of schedule. Did I say he did a GREAT job AAA++

name: Meghan Darby
text: William painted the trim, interior walls, and ceilings of our new (older) home. He was expertly meticulous and all finishes were perfect. We could not be more pleased with the outcome. He also stuck to our timeline, budget, and was extremely trustworthy.

name: Darrell Stokes
text: William has painted a fence, bedroom and bathroom for me.  His prices and especially his quick response and flexibility has allowed me to finish some jobs around the house in a minimal amount of time and cost.  He has always been quick to give me an estimate and even quicker to get out and get the work done.  I will be using him again!

name: Matt H
text: Great job staining my deck! Great attention to detail.  Would definitely recommend.

name: Hal Wilson
text: William: hard worker, and went out of his way to be helpful. The paint job on the side of the house? You've only gotta ask the neighbors. Plus, plus.

name: Jerrell Reynolds
text: Our eves on the house were peeling really bad. I called William and he was able to come out at MY convenience and take care of them. he went the extra mile by scraping off all the old paint to prevent it from peeling again. William did a great job and at a great price. No paint in places its not suppose to be and real clean lines. Rain came in but he came back out on the next day when there was no rain and finished the job. He did such a good job we had him paint our garage door while he was there. defiantly calling him back to do our fence in the near future. A+ job and very professional guy.

name: Marsau Scott
text:
I have had the pleasure of dealing with the owner today. He and I didn't see eye to eye at first, we both communicated our frustration, and in the end we resolved our differences in a healthy manner. People and businesses make mistakes but the mark of a true businessman is how he/she is accepts responsibility for their actions and continues to make positive changes.
Thank you William, I look forward seeing your company progress.

name: Andrew
text: From my experience, the people working here are not really all that knowledgeable about the products as they should be. Really frustrating. Really really frustrating. It was two guys who couldn’t answer basic questions. Yalls paint is too damn expensive to not be training your staff. I went to Benjamin Moore instead.

resp.text: Hi Andrew, Thank you for sharing the details of your recent experience with us and we truly apologize for the lack of customer service you received at our store. Extensive training is administered to all staff, who we hold to a very high standard. We'd like to discuss the situation with you and put you in touch with the appropriate Sherwin-Williams contact who can assist.  Please contact us at 1-800-4Sherwin (474-3794) or by email at bit.ly/2Dgu0Ti. Please include your store location, if applicable, when reaching out. Thank you and again we apologize for this situation. Sincerely, T.H., SW Customer Service Rep.

name: Colette H
text: I have been coming to this store for my painting needs for the past 5 years. I had the DISpleasure with an associate there today named Christina. I am still recovering/reconstructing my home after hurricane sally. I had bought a gallon of paint back in January that had leaked from the bottom all over my garage floor. I am just getting around to returning to the store to exchange it. Christina not only told me the associate selling me the paint in January sold me the wrong kind but then proceeded to argue with me and not give credit on the exchange. I’m told leaking cans happen (of which the other associate offered) but this apparently very unhappy (never smiled, devoid of social skills) person, Christina, would not credit a longtime customer for a faulty can of paint. I will not ever buy anything from this store (or Sherwin Williams) ever again. #onelesscustomer #sherwinwilliamspaint #nocustomerserviceskills #swpaint
